topics.body:
Here is something to darken your day :|!http://i.imgur.com/6eHnOLM.png!

_My big brother hung himself when I was very young. He did it right off the roof of our garage. My parents protected me enough that I only realized that he was gone. I used to have this horse swing that my dad made for me. The rope on it was old and really smooth on my hands from it being used so much. I have a distinct memory of the rope being replaced with a new one and I hated it so much because it was rough on my hands. I probably even complained to my parents about it. It wasn't until years later when I found out that my brother had cut down my favorite swing to use the rope to commit suicide. I still feel awful about my anger as a child about it. It's irrational, but I can't let go of it._
